title: Tell me about a book that impressed you.

korean: 음, 작년에 읽었던 '달러구트 꿈 백화점'이라는 책이 인상 깊었어요.
친구가 추천해줘서 읽게 됐는데, 정말 재밌더라고요.
꿈을 파는 백화점이라는 설정 자체가 독특하고 신선했어요.
판타지 소설이긴 한데, 내용이 따뜻하고 감동적이었거든요.
주인공이 꿈 백화점에서 일하면서 겪는 이야기들인데요,
읽으면서 제 꿈에 대해서도 생각해보게 되더라고요.
특히 마지막 부분이 정말 감동적이어서 눈물이 날 뻔했어요.
책을 덮고 나서도 한동안 여운이 남았던 것 같아요.
그 이후로 그 작가의 다른 책들도 찾아서 읽었어요.
주변 사람들한테도 이 책 추천 많이 했고요.
읽고 나서 기분이 좋아지는 책이어서 정말 좋았어요.
가끔 다시 읽고 싶을 때가 있어요.
english: Um, a book called 'The Midnight Dream Department Store' that I read last year impressed me.
A friend recommended it so I read it, and it was really fun.
The concept itself of a department store that sells dreams was unique and fresh.
It's a fantasy novel, but the content was warm and touching.
It's about the stories the main character experiences while working at the dream department store,
and while reading, it made me think about my own dreams too.
Especially the last part was really touching, I almost cried.
Even after closing the book, I think the lingering feeling remained for a while.
After that, I looked for and read other books by that author.
I recommended this book to many people around me too.
It was a book that made me feel good after reading, so it was really nice.
Sometimes I want to read it again.
